citations.narrative:
There were a large number of flies in the sheep pens. Several flies were observed flying around the bedding and feed
areas of the enclosures.
Failure to maintain an effective insect control program can allow for the introduction and spread of disease hazards to the
animals.
The licensee must ensure that a safe and effective pest control program is established and maintained at the facility.
Correct by : July 16, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
There were a large number of flies in the sheep pens. Several flies were observed flying around the bedding and feed 
areas of the enclosures. 
Failure to maintain an effective insect control program can allow for the introduction and spread of disease hazards to the 
animals. 
The licensee must ensure that a safe and effective pest control program is established and maintained at the facility. 
Correct by : July 16, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
